Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class IId bacteriocin
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Listeria innocua ATCC 33091 (++++), L. innocua CIP 78.44 (++++), Listeria monocytogens ATCC 19112 (+++++), Listeria welshimeri ATCC 43551 (+++++), Listeria seeligeri CIP79.46 (+++++).Note:++++ clear inhibit zone with diameter 16-20 mm, and +++++ clear inhibit zone with diameter ≥20 mm.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: mature LSEI_2386 was a putative pheromone peptide that also had significant bacteriocin activity against several Listeria species. The activities of both peptides tolerat 121°C for 30 min but not treatment with proteinase K or trypsin.

Literature.Title: Characterization of putative class II bacteriocins identified from a non-bacteriocin-producing strain Lactobacillus casei ATCC 334.
Literature.Author: Kuo YC, Liu CF, Lin JF, Li AC, Lo TC, Lin TH.
